channel.title: General Politics Obama Barack Obama Democratic Election on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: YES WE CAN. Obama apparently wins the democratic nomination
item.description: Barack Obama seems to have won the democratic nomination. After all the time and work we all put into his campaign, I am VERY happy to hear this news. I am more happy that Hilary Clinton didn’t win. She was really hurting my insides me with all the negative campaigning. I did not like how attacky she got in the end. I hope that she is done being annoying. Now is the time to start supporting the Barack Obama, and the democratic party to defeat John McCain in November.
